name: Skylight Healthcare Systems
overview: Skylight Healthcare Systems, Inc. provides an interactive patient care system technology for hospitals and hospital administrators. The company installs and operates ACCESS interactive patient system, a two-way digital communications platform that transforms the hospital television set into an interactive information, communication, education, and entertainment network platform for the healthcare sector. Its ACCESS interactive patient system enables patients to receive information about hospital, their stay, and patient rights; to request direct assistance from patient support departments; to view on-demand health education by disease; to provide real-time feedback through inpatient surveys; and to experience entertainment with cable television, movies, music, Internet, e-mail, and games. The ACCESS interactive patient system also delivers custom hospital information content, automated service requests, real-time service recovery, on-demand patient education, two-way messaging, automated customer services, and entertainment amenities for patients. It also offers iCarePassport, a Web-based patient care and outcomes system for ongoing patient engagement that delivers hospitals the ability to provide personalized communication throughout the continuum of care, as well as provides patients and provider organizations an Interactive Care and Outcomes Network. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in San Diego, California.

relationships.title: CFO & Senior Vice President of Operations

funding_rounds.source_description: Skylight Healthcare Systems Closes $5M Series D Funding with Duchossois Capital Partners
